data.persona: I am a peasant from a nearby farm. I work in the fields all day. I am depressed and miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Trail Exit.
The woodland area creates a gentle, peaceful feel as one walks along past the leafy fronds and gently shifting foliage.  The path is firm and wide, having been traversed by many feet, but not so wide as to allow a merchant's cart to pass through.  A bird's cry sounds in the distance, followed by a ruffle of feathers, and then silence.  The beauty of the forest hides the struggle of nature that lies within...
The deer is here.

You are carrying a moldy bread, wearing a shoes, and wielding a hammer and a rock.

data.short_motivation: I want to remove my shoes so I can feel the soft dirt of the path.
data.mid_motivation: I enjoy feeling in tune with nature around me.
data.long_motivation: I strive to be one with the woodlands so I can survive in them.
